products.name: La Lagartija
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous.. The best choice for the start of your journey! It wil provide you a rich delicious flavor

products.name: El Tigre
products.description: Really dark coffee, only for the real gourmets. It has bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts with carmel

products.name: La Cucarcha
products.description: Sweet and intense with a big amount of different flavors. Carmel,grapes,strawberry, you name it! It's great choice for warm summer days
